posts.name: iphone11
posts.description: Announced in September 2019, the iPhone 11 was released alongside the iPhone 11 Pro and the iPhone 11 Pro Max. Originally priced at $699, the iPhone 11 was touted as Apple’s newest low-priced phone and the successor to 2018’s slightly pricier iPhone XR. It boasts the same form and screen as the XR, but with Apple’s all-new A13 Bionic chip and an upgraded camera system.

posts.name: iphone12
posts.description: Apple iPhone 12 comes with the latest operating system of iOS 14.1, It has Apple A14 Bionic (5 nm), It offers a powerful CPU, It offers Hexa-core (2×3.1 GHz Firestorm + 4×1.8 GHz Icestorm), It contains Apple GPU (4-core graphics), it presents a superb performance without any lags, It offers excellent & up-to-date software.

posts.name: Dell laptop
posts.description: The best Laptop with an Intel® Pentium® Gold Processor 7505 (4MB Cache, up to 3.5 GHz) processor. It has Intel® UHD Graphics with shared graphics memory and the battery life is about 7-8 hours

posts.name: Kenstar Mixer
posts.description: This is Powered by a 300W motor, the coffee bean grinder only takes 5 to 20 seconds to deliver consistent coarse powder. You can enjoy the delightful flavors of fresh coffee by customizing the grind size for cold brew coffee, french press, pour over, moka pot, espresso.

posts.name: Magic Mouse
posts.description: Best Mouse that could work with apple devices. Its sleek design and build quality is the best in the market. High Precision PMW3389 Optical Sensor: Equipped with the strongest, most competitive grade mouse sensor chip, with up to 16,000 DPI,IPS of up to 400, and incomparable gripping precision for maximum tracking accuracy. Whether it is for work or gaming, the M1 offers an unparallel experience
